name: AI Fundamentals
description: Core concepts and foundational principles of artificial intelligence, including basic definitions, historical context, and key terminology.

name: Machine Learning
description: Algorithms and techniques that enable computers to learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed for every task.

name: Deep Learning Architectures
description: Neural network-based models with multiple layers, designed to process complex patterns in high-dimensional data like images, audio, and text.

name: Prompt Engineering
description: Techniques for designing and optimizing input prompts to guide large language models (LLMs) and other generative AI systems in producing desired outputs.

name: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
description: Techniques and models focused on understanding, processing, and generating human language â€” including tasks like tokenization, summarization, and translation.

name: Computer Vision
description: AI techniques that enable machines to interpret and understand visual information from the world, including image recognition, object detection, and scene analysis.

name: Generative AI
description: AI systems that can create new content, including text, images, audio, and video, based on patterns learned from training data.

name: AI Ethics & Safety
description: Principles, guidelines, and practices for developing and deploying AI systems responsibly, addressing bias, fairness, transparency, and potential risks.

name: LLMs & Transformers
description: Large language models and transformer architectures that power modern AI systems like GPT, BERT, and other state-of-the-art language understanding models.

name: AI Tools & Platforms
description: Software frameworks, libraries, and platforms used for developing, training, and deploying AI models and applications.

name: Robotics & Automation
description: AI applications in physical systems, including autonomous vehicles, industrial automation, and intelligent robotic systems.

name: AI in Business
description: Commercial applications and business strategies for implementing AI, including use cases, ROI considerations, and industry-specific applications.
